title: Anti-Hero

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- At the beginning of the game, immediately gain all of the abilities and attributes of a random Neutral Killing who is able to deal Unstoppable attacks. You do not gain their defense, or any protection methods.
- Your kills are attributed to the role you gained.
- If you are lynched, attack one of your voters with a Powerful attack from the grave the next night.

desc:
Post 1466
*Some things have to be done.*
Roleblock Immunity
Control Immunity
Redirect Immunity
